meta.title: Deer Valley Unified School District / Homepage

meta.name: description
meta.content: Deer Valley Unified School District is a PreK-12 school district located in north Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Anthem and New River Arizona. DVUSD has free all day kindergarten starting in 2014-15.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: dvusd, deer valley unified school district, phoenix, glendale, peoria, new river, anthem, arizona, k-12, elementary, secondary, pre-school, blended full day kindergarten
Deer Valley Unified School District / Homepage
Deer Valley Unified School District is a PreK-12 school district located in north Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Anthem and New River Arizona. DVUSD has free all day kindergarten starting in 2014-15.

Deer Valley Unified School District / Homepage
Deer Valley Unified School District is a PreK-12 school district located in north Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Anthem and New River Arizona. DVUSD has free all day kindergarten starting in 2014-15.

a.title: Go to comments for Home Learning Resources and Schedules

div.p: On Friday, March 20, Governor Ducey and State Superintendent Hoffman extended the Arizona school closures until at least April 10.

a.title: Go to comments for Novel Coronavirus - COVID-19 Update

div.p: Click to go to the Virtual Meet and Greet from the Traditional Academy at Bellair

a.title: Go to comments for Traditional Academy at Bellair Update

div.p: We are all in this together. Every single one of us.

a.title: Go to comments for CENSUS 2020

a.span: Apply NOW for Career and Technical Education Classes

div.p: Sophomores and juniors, are you still interested in applying for West-MEC or CTE signature programs? It's not too late! Click here for the all virtual application process.

a.title: Go to comments for Apply NOW for Career and Technical Education Classes

a.span: Traditional Academy at Bellair Curriculum Adoption

a.title: Alternative Formats
Go to comments for Traditional Academy at Bellair Curriculum Adoption
Alternative Formats
Go to comments for Health Curriculum Adoption Review

div.p: Our newest school will be called Union Park School, mascot is Toros and colors are Gold and Black

a.title: Go to comments for Union Park School Updates

div.p: The DVUSD Governing Board has considered and voted on four boundary change options after DVUSD held ten Community Meetings, a study session, and multiple Governing Board Meetings. Click read more for details.

a.title: Go to comments for School Boundary Initiative - Updated 2/13/20

a.span: DV Times Article About Union Park School and The Traditional Academy at Bellair

a.title: Alternative Formats

div.p: Click on the picture or headline to go to the DVTimes story.

a.title: Go to comments for DV Times Article About Union Park School and The Traditional Academy at Bellair

div.p: Open Enrollment is now underway for the current and next school year. Through Open Enrollment, your child has the opportunity to attend any school of their choice, if capacity permits.

a.title: Go to comments for Open Enrollment

a.span: 2018-2019 A-F Letter Grades Released by Arizona Department of Education

a.title: Go to comments for 2018-2019 A-F Letter Grades Released by Arizona Department of Education

div.p: Information about the big kids club.

a.title: Go to comments for Who Wants Free Books?

img.alt: Characters sitting around a table with a puzzle

div.p: PLCs provide the time teachers need to review individual student learning progress. Get the new 2019-20 school calendar here also.

a.title: Go to comments for Professional Learning Communities

a.span: DVUSD's Mobile App keeps you informed. Download for free and try it out.

div.p:
The DVUSD mobile app connects you to your child's school.
To get the new app go to Google Play or the Apple App Store. You decide which schools to get information from.

a.title: Go to comments for DVUSD's Mobile App keeps you informed. Download for free and try it out.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

p.span: Who are you? is the first question I receive from students when I step into a classroom at Deer Valley Unified School District (DVUSD) on one of my 500 classroom visits a year. Now that I have visited over 1500 classrooms the last three years, I also hear, You were in my classroom last year!

a.br: Read Dr.Finch's full State of the District Report
